attributes.action: Run an immediate covid19 test for the nation.
attributes.additional_details: It is important to know the real data of the cases because if the nation choose to don't test regularly then we will suffer consequences and overwhelming in the future.
attributes.background: Please run a covid19 testing for the whole nation because of the continuous falling cases.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see more data about Covid-19 rates, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Covid-19 tests are already freely available through the NHS: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/testing/get-tested-for-coronavirus/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
